item.title: Herding behavior in cryptocurrency markets
item.description: Supplementary notes can be added here, including [code and math](https://sourcethemes.com/academic/docs/writing-markdown-latex/). --

Born and raised in the calid Caribbean zone of Costa Rica. Life long learner & doer. Enthusiast, performing the best in every situation while enjoying the journey is the only way. Currently working as a predoctoral researcher of the Applied Economics department at Autonomous University of Barcelona (UAB), where I also teach introductory economics courses. On my spare time you will find me outdoors üèûÔ∏è
